profile.name: Spandan Banerjee
profile.title: Software Developer & Data Science Enthusiast
profile.education: St. Thomas' College of Engineering and Technology, Kolkata

introduction: Hello! I'm Spandan Banerjee, a passionate Software Developer and Data Science Enthusiast with a love for creating innovative solutions and exploring the intersection of technology and data. Currently associated with IBM, I enjoy working on diverse projects that challenge my skills and expand my knowledge.

My journey in technology has led me through various domains including web development, data analysis, machine learning, and software engineering. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and contribute to meaningful projects that make a difference.

facts.text: St. Thomas' College of Engineering and Technology, Kolkata

featured.title: IBM Watson Translator
featured.description: Flask-based English to French translator using IBM Watson
featured.longDescription: A web application that translates text between English and French using IBM Watson's language translation services.

contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just having a conversation about technology and innovation. Feel free to reach out through any of the platforms below!
